Author: Peter Selch Dahl - Azure MVP
Summary: This Azure Automation script can automatic adjust the size of the Azure virtual machines while the server is either running or shutdown. This operation could be used to save money when you aren’t using the servers so heavily perhaps during the weekend or during the night.
Title: Adjust / Scale the size of an Azure Virtual Machine while running or shutdown
UserTags: Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Automation, VM Lifecycle Management
